TitleEnglish: The Story of the Muku Tree
SummaryEnglish: A work that talks about the transition of the four seasons visiting an old tree with the composer Fumio Hayasaka's elegant gekitomo music. Standing in Hirono is an old Muku tree. In the fall, a concert of bugs confuses his loneliness. However, when the starlings came, the fall was over. The devil's winter general came to follow the arrival of the crane. However, every day goes around, spring. Starlings and insects reappeared in the warm sunlight. In this way, Muku Tree waits for summer while enjoying peace. ...
